data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS    Latest Canary (Unsure of version #)
data.actual_result: The user count stays as the "@ everyone" user count
data.expected_result: It should only display the total number of users with the role being filtered
data.short_description: Filtering users by role in the member list of server settings still displays the "@ everyone" user count
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into the member list of a server - Filter members by role (Check user count before filtering) - Compare current user count to the "@ everyone" user count
